website_summaries.verdict: With the latest technology housed in a sleeker design, this 5 port model is even a bit lighter than the others in its class.
pros: 40 watts and 8 amps dispersed over 5 USB charging ports give this model plenty of power
Combined with Anker's PowerIQ and VoltageBoost at every port, this unit is sure to take care of your family's charging needs
cons: Some users have found this model prone to overheating
It is recommend that it not be used in confined spaces

customer_reviews.title: reliable and durable
customer_reviews.text: I been using this USB charging station for several months now for both 1.0A and 2.0A devices. I waited a while to write this review because I've had some mediocre experiences with other USB chargers. This charger is still as good as the day I first set it up. I use it primarily for charging (2.0A) cell phones, Kindles and USP power bricks for back up power. All devices charge to 100% (on the cell phone, turn off all apps, or better still, turn cell phone off during charging to get faster charge, 100% charge). Leaving apps on during charging may limit cell phone "full charge" to about 97%.
customer_reviews.author: Larry Howell

customer_reviews.title: Fast charging of tablets and phones.
customer_reviews.text: With others I've had before, they: A) fail after a couple of months, and B) always seem to have only ONE high current port for a tablet. If you want something that lasts, just buy an Anker brand cord or charger. I am so done buying cheap crap that never lasts. I bought this charger after using their cords for a long time, and when the next cheapo charger fails, I will get another one of these. The one I have now is next to my chair in the living room, and it's become the household charging station for almost everything.
customer_reviews.author: Craig U.

customer_reviews.title: Don’t bother
customer_reviews.text: Returned after a day. The slots that you plug the usb cords into does not fit them properly. They move around since they aren’t snug in the slots. Junk so I already returned them. What happened to the quality of anker products?
customer_reviews.author: Julie Sanchez

customer_reviews.title: I won't buy any other brand USB chargers!
customer_reviews.text: I've been purchasing Anker USB chargers and Anker USB battery packs for many years now and they ALL continue to work like the day I purchased them. Anker continues to release new models with the latest interfaces and specifications to keep up with the industry. This charger is small, lightweight, and has a removable AC cord which makes it easy for packing. Love Anker and won't stray away from this brand for my USB charger/battery needs!
customer_reviews.author: mbender71

customer_reviews.title: High quality
customer_reviews.text: This is the second unit I purchased, I liked the first one so much that I purchased another for travel. You need to be careful that you don't plug your $700 phone into a $2 charger, I have purchased Anker products in the past and all have been excellent quality, this follows that standard. It's nice and small so that I can pack it in my backpack for travel. The cord unplugs making it easier for portability. Great product by an innovative manufacturer.
customer_reviews.author: Steve Jacob

customer_reviews.title: 40W of pure power
customer_reviews.text: Need a charging station for your power hungry gadgets?? This is the best way to solve that problem backing by a big company that takes quality control on product & customer service number one. I have own many anker product.. Cable, wall chargers, external battery, and wireless headset. The quality build of all anker product is top notch as I have not had one item break on me yet. I highly recommend this product for people that have multiple devices to charge. I have one setup in the livingroom table which is the hangout spot when friends and family come over for board game night everybody can bring their own cable to keep their phones charged.
customer_reviews.author: Andy L

customer_reviews.title: Love this charger
customer_reviews.text: I used this charger to create a charging station in my work area so I can charge my phones and iPad and kindle and other things at the same time. I only gave it 4 stars for charging power because it does not have enough power to charge a laptop but it’s fine for all my other needs. For traveling this would be fine, but I prefer a two port charger with a folding plug to save space and a little weight. It’s easy to use and I have bought several of these chargers and never had a problem. Yes I would buy this again.
customer_reviews.author: GeoMan

customer_reviews.title: Useless
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my wife as a Christmas gift and she can't even use it because the plug outlet is European or something. It won't fit in a normal plug!! What the heck? This is America!!.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie Plourde

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight for travel
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this item to use on a cruise and it was a perfect choice. There was only 1 available plug for two people to use in the cabin. This item charged an I-phone and Galaxy at the same time with no problem. I used it to charge a Kindle and a Nook as well as a portable fan. The length of the cord allowed the phone to reach the sleeping area so I could charge the phone while watching Netflix. This is a great product for its intended purchase and did not disappoint.
customer_reviews.author: Nick1177

customer_reviews.title: Power IQ and Voltage Boost?
customer_reviews.text: This charger worked and did what it was meant to do, I returned because it said " Power IQ and Voltage Boost " I now know this is Not Fast or Quick charger but a Standard Smart charger with further research I need to find a charger with Charging Technology 3.0 to activate fast charging on my Android phone
customer_reviews.author: Moto Guy

customer_reviews.title: I love Anker products. This was a bit disappointing.
customer_reviews.text: I usually love Anker products, own several, but this was a bit disappointing. It works fine with most things as a charger/power source, but when I plugged in a portable Bluetooth speaker to power/charge it, there was a LOT of hum. I plugged the speaker back into a wall wart USB cube, and it was fine. But when plugged back into this device - lots of hum. Since the speaker works fine with several USB wall warts I tried, I have to assume this device doesn't filter its output sufficiently to just act as a power supply in certain instances. Works fine as a charger, just be aware of that limitation.
customer_reviews.author: Blue11

customer_reviews.title: The best USB charger on Amazon
customer_reviews.text: This is one of the favorite products I have gotten from Amazon. It’s great value, high quality with nice matte finish, durable, easy to transport as the cable is detachable and most importantly it charges my devices faster than other chargers. It’s perfect for traveling and I’ve never had problem with it and I have brought it with me on 50+ trips. I have used it daily for more than 2 years and I absolutely recommend it to anyone that needs versatile and high quality USB charger.
customer_reviews.author: Dejan Markovkj

customer_reviews.title: Reliable and long lasting
customer_reviews.text: Great charging block. I bought one a few years ago that's still working perfectly and recently ordered a second one for downstairs. Lots of ports, fast charging is lightning. I ended up supergluing the power cord into place after a while because it hangs over the middle of my sofa and kept slipping out, but if you plan to travel with it, it's nice to have the removable powercord. All in all a great charging brick.
customer_reviews.author: N.P.

customer_reviews.title: Has one job and does it well.
customer_reviews.text: It's handy to have a portable charger for up to 5 USB devices, and this one is a great deal. I've purchased other Anker devices, and they stood up to their claims. This device has one job, charging devices, and it seems to do it well. It's also small, lightweight, with a fairly long cord to plug into the power. It's not meant to be a USB hub; it only charges devices. Be aware of that before purchasing. I'd give it five stars if it was designed for in car use as well. Maybe that's unfair of me, but for the price, I'm sure they could include a cord that plugs into a car outlet.
customer_reviews.author: John G.Top Contributor: Cooking

customer_reviews.title: Did not work for my Apple products
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately this usb wall charger did not work with my devices. I intended to use the charger with an Apple Watch, AirPods, iPhone and iPad. I am using the Apple original charging cords. All of the devices start charging when plugged in, but then stop charging a few seconds later and then start charging again a few seconds later and so on. The devices are continuously dinging as if the power cord is being removed and reinserted. I will have to return the device.
customer_reviews.author: A. Lee

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my needs
customer_reviews.text: I already had an Anker charger for travel which I've been please with which is why I bought from Anker again. I wanted this one to create sort of a charging station in the house. It seems to work just fine, no complaints. I chose this one because of the wall cord that comes with it allowing the charger to be away from the outlet itself. With five ports, it is plenty to connect all our devices at once.
customer_reviews.author: Mark C.

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality Product & Value
customer_reviews.text: Love Anker Products. Never had any issue with any products purchased by Anker. Always great quality and great value. This items is lightweight compact and charges quickly. Does not over heat and is made great. Highly recommend this item to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Jade

customer_reviews.title: lOVE ANKER products!
customer_reviews.text: I love this 5 port charger!!! I can now charge my hearing aids, streaming device, cell phone, and tablet and still have room for another if I need it!! I have 2 other Anker chargers that have the 2 ports and I love them also, but now that I have started wearing hearing aids along with a bluetooth streaming thing, I need more ports. None of these get warm, unlike another brand I bought. I also love the anker charging cables, they are so much better than the ones that come with the phones and tablets.
customer_reviews.author: 1mamaj

customer_reviews.title: Great for those of us with multiple devices
customer_reviews.text: purchased for my work toolbox since I had various USB charging tools and device and didn't have enough outlets on my power strip. Now I can charge my flash, my work tablet, a 2nd flashlight, and my phone all at once. Wish I had gotten the one with 1 port for quick charging but the charging from this is good enough, just make sure you have quality USB cords.
customer_reviews.author: James G.

customer_reviews.title: Two very enthusiatic thumbs up!
customer_reviews.text: This device is excellent in function after two days of use. Love that it comes with a velcro strap for wrapping up the cord and when paired with a 4 pack of Anker 1 foot Micro USB charging cables (also packaged with individual velcro straps) suits all my charging needs. The size is great (quite compact) and packaging also includes an adhesive strip for stabilising it on your desk or other surface. Very satisfied with this product from Anker. Only reason 4 stars given for travelling is that it would have been nice to get a small carrying pouch for movement after unboxing.
customer_reviews.author: Courtney Laidlaw

customer_reviews.title: One port failed after 2year
customer_reviews.text: Just passed 2 year and one of the port failed , can’t charged. Normal use, it stays at the media console table not even move the cord for two years. As a big fan of Anker, I thought it was the cord but after several tempt found out it was the port. I am so surprised and a bit disappointed it was not durable as it advertised. Can’t do anything because there’s no warranty after 2 years.
customer_reviews.author: Fiona W.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product at an amazing price!
customer_reviews.text: Anker USB hubs/chargers etc have been working great for me. Super handy for travelling with, esp if you have a native power cord for your destination (it uses a standard size detachable one). Everything about the product seems super high quality, even the packaging! I've been dragging one of their six port chargers with the quick charge port around the world with me for a while now and it's been amazing, just bought another couple of these more basic five port ones to leave around the house and they are also very nice :-)
customer_reviews.author: Mr N J Shearer

customer_reviews.title: Anker USB Multi Port Charger
customer_reviews.text: This brand charger was recommended to me by both my son and daughter who have the Anker chargers. Decided to purchase the 6 port charger and give it a try. No regrets about the purchase. This is the second Anker charger that I purchased. The fist one was a six port charger and I use that mainly when I travel. Had to get another one since the wife also has things to charge when we travel. Now with two chargers, there should be more then enough charging ports for the both of use. I would recommend this product to anyone that need a multi charger.
customer_reviews.author: Ron808

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Product that I recommend to anyone looking for convenience and a fast charge
customer_reviews.text: I had bought an Anker USB charger last year and because I loved it so much I bought my mom one and she can't stop raving about how convenient and great it is. Highly recommend this product to anyone who has many items that need charging at once and quickly! I like to use my phone while I am laying in bed before sleeping and this item makes it possible to keep my phone charged by reaching me to my bed. It charges my phone, my Bluetooth headphone set, and my fitbit extremely fast and have had no problems with it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Fan

customer_reviews.title: FANTASTIC CUSTOMER SERVICE
customer_reviews.text: Love Anker products, with what I have purchased in the past I have had no issues what so ever. I had one port on the unit die after 8 months of faithful use. I called Anker and spoke to Ashley in Seattle and within a few minutes time she had setup a replacement unit for me. Talk about standing behind your products, most places give you a hard time even 30 days after purchase but I am and will continue to be a Anker fan. Thanks Ashley
customer_reviews.author: Brandon Buff

customer_reviews.title: Solid, well-built charger.
customer_reviews.text: Pros: (1) Very solid build, UL-approved (which a HUGE number are not), easy set up and well documented. Very well packaged also. Fast charging and does not overheat at all. It can handle whatever I need without issue. I would easily recommend this one to anyone looking for a quality product. Cons: None at this time.
customer_reviews.author: inveterate reader

customer_reviews.title: Easy peasy.
customer_reviews.text: Needed a simple higher current and regular current charging station for my office desk. In my office I have the need to not only keep my standard devices charged (bluetooth headsets, etc.) but also my high current (phablet, tablet, etc.) devices charged. This is perfect. Plugging directly into the wall rather than a computer it not only meets my power needs but also I don't have to worry about corporate going bonkers worrying about what device I've connected. The unit arrived quickly, was easy to set up and included double sided tape so I could easily mount it to my desk.
customer_reviews.author: Allen

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding product. Apple like quality
customer_reviews.text: I have been buying Anker products ever since the company started selling on Amazon. It keeps on improving their quality and design. Great product. The only thing missing is a light indicating that the USB switch is on. Otherwise perfect. Apple level quality, if I can make this comparison.
customer_reviews.author: Tadek

customer_reviews.title: Too many electronics and not enough outlets? This is for you!
customer_reviews.text: I wasn't sure if it would work in Korea without the use of a voltage converter but it works with the little two prong converter. I love how quickly it charges my electronics! You have to get creative on where you want it to be charging from, no one likes a cluttered mess. I also like the fact that it's portable. This Anker item will travel with me, another reason to love it! I do wonder if they made different plugs (i.e. Asia, Europe ends).
customer_reviews.author: the zig

customer_reviews.title: Best non-qc charger I've ever used.
customer_reviews.text: After buying one for home, I had to get two more to prevent a family riot, then another for travel. It is SO NICE carrying one device, plugging into one outlet, and having plenty of power (and ports) for phones, tablets, headsets, smart watches, and anything else that charges via USB. While it doesn't do Quick Charge, I don't mind because my devices are fully charged when I wake.
customer_reviews.author: Ben Carner

customer_reviews.title: I’d buy it again
customer_reviews.text: I love that this product charges up to 5 devices quickly. I’d been using another brand that only charged 2 devices at a time and didn’t charge quickly. When that died I bought the Anker and it’s been a great product in the few weeks I’ve been using it.
customer_reviews.author: Amiebee

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: I use this one to charge all the electronics on my nightstand. The other one I bought both charges things and runs a few Raspberry Pis. Both have performed flawlessly, without any hiccups. No apparent impacts on one port when plugging in or removing things from other ports. Highly recommended...
customer_reviews.author: Alan Curtis

customer_reviews.title: Convenient multi-port charger
customer_reviews.text: This is an excellent multi-port USB charger. It is nice to be able to charge up multiple devices from one outlet. Things charge quickly. I have one of these that I keep at my office and bought this one to keep in my suitcase for when I travel because hotels often don't have enough outlets to charge all the electronics. I love the Anker brand — I have several products from them and every one of them has been great.
customer_reviews.author: JP

customer_reviews.title: Great quick charging USB hub
customer_reviews.text: Great quick charging USB hub! I've been a fan of Anker for a few years now, and I've been looking for a quick charger for home. This is definitely the one! I usually charge my phone by itself, but I'll occasionally charge another phone or battery pack with this. Charging anything from 1-90% takes about 1min per 2% then the last 10% will take a little longer than that, but it's still really fast! I would definitely recommend this hub to anyone who needs quick charging with multiple ports! Please note: the cable is detachable from the hub itself and is about 3ft in length, which is nice!
customer_reviews.author: Jonathon

customer_reviews.title: Bought 2; one is perfect, the other has low output
customer_reviews.text: I bought a couple of these, one of them is excellent and has been totally reliable. The other one, I've just figured out, emits inadequate power to charge some things. For example, I have a couple back-up batteries for my iPhone, different manufacturers, and the one charger won't fully charge them, they both go up to 3 of 4 lights, and the third light flashes and the charge doesn't complete regardless of length of time. I have an iPod that charges fine on the "good" one, but won't charge at all on the other one. I need to replace the one, but I will get a different brand this time.
customer_reviews.author: sdjewbs

customer_reviews.title: It's an Anker
customer_reviews.text: I buy Anker products because they work. I needed a small charger for my nightstand and this does the trick. It's never hot, charges quickly, and does not take up a lot of real estate. Not sure what else I can say - it works!
customer_reviews.author: SD

customer_reviews.title: Like the size and the compact profile of this device
customer_reviews.text: Like the size and the compact profile of this device; however, was disappointed in the charging speed. After reading their website information re: this product, I was hoping my quick charge compatible phone would charge faster than normal usb. But that's not the case. I thought Power IQ was something different than it is.
customer_reviews.author: sarah ogilvy

customer_reviews.title: Fast, durable, easy to hide in plain sight!
customer_reviews.text: Works great! Rests on the back of our couch, against the wall, and stays put. We had a cheaper brand there and it quit working after a couple months and would always come unplugged from its cord. Not this one! So far, so good. It’s a great way to charge/use our devices while we’re hanging out on the couch and keep it hidden when not in use.
customer_reviews.author: S. LeeTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Works great, quick charging.
customer_reviews.text: This is a must have, especially for trips with a lot of people with a lot of devices traveling together and needing to charge with minimal outlet access. Charging multiple devices at once didn't slow down charging, either -- very fast. Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: LS

customer_reviews.title: Really nice USB adapter.
customer_reviews.text: So many of my things are now USB charged that I needed a good adapter. Phone, two flashlights, radio, etc. If you want a nice charging hub for your USB products I recommend this one. Ports hold charging cords nicely and there are plenty of them.
customer_reviews.author: W. Martin

product_meta.title: Anker 40W 5-Port USB Wall Charger, PowerPort 5 for iPhone XS / XS Max / XR / X / 8 / 7 / 6 / Plus, iPad Pro / Air 2 / mini, Galaxy S9 / S8 / Edge / Plus, Note 8 / 7, LG, Nexus, HTC and More, Black (AK-A2124111)
product_meta.description:
AMERICA'S LEADING USB CHARGING BRAND
- Faster and safer charging with our leading technology
- 10 million+ happy users and counting
Anker PowerPort 5
40W 5-port USB charging hub for phones, tablets & more 
Advanced Charging Technology
Exclusive to Anker, PowerIQ and VoltageBoost combine to ensure the fastest possible charge. (Does not support Qualcomm Quick Charge).
Ultra Powerful
Five ports pump out 40 watts of power, enabling simultaneous multi-device charging.
High Efficiency
Rated DOE 6 highly energy efficient by the US Dept. of Energy.
MultiProtect Safety System
Surge protection, temperature control and more advanced safety features keep you and your devices safe.
UL Certified
Built with industry grade materials and premium circuitry, this product meets the rigorous safety standards of Underwriters Laboratories.
Super Compact
As small and light as a pack of cards, the Anker PowerPort 5 is one of the most compact multi-port USB chargers on the market.
For Optimal Use:
- Use your original cable or a third-party certified one (such as MFi).
- Compatible with Apple and Android smartphones, tablets (including the Nexus 7) and other USB-charged devices.
- Do not place PowerPort 5 in an enclosed space while charging. This may cause the charger to overheat.
- Do not place any electronics which give off heat on top of PowerPort 5.
Note:
; If a port isn't working properly, it may be because your device has triggered the protective internal safety switch. In order to reset the switch, unplug all cables (including power cable) for five seconds and retry.
; This charger is not compatible with the iPod nano, iPod Classic, iPod Shuffle, HP TouchPad and Asus tablets.
; We recommend charging your MacBook while it's turned off or in sleep mode (5-hour recharge time).
feature_bullets: The Anker Advantage: Join the 50 million+ powered by America's leading USB charging brand.
Advanced Charging Technology: PowerIQ and VoltageBoost combine to provide the fastest possible charge up to 2.4 amps per port or 8 amps overall (Does not support Qualcomm Quick Charge).
Ultra Powerful: Five ports pump out 40 watts of power, enabling simultaneous multi-device charging. Rated DOE Level 6 for energy efficiency.
Certified Safe: Anker's MultiProtect safety system and UL certification ensures complete protection for you and your devices. Worldwide 100-240 volt AC input voltage.
What You Get: Anker PowerPort 5 (40W 5-Port USB Charging Hub), 5ft detachable power cord, welcome guide, our fan-favorite 18-month warranty and friendly customer service.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.8 out of 5 stars3,645 ratings4.8 out of 5 stars
